# Session Information

```{r, echo=FALSE}
end_time <- Sys.time()
tdiff <- end_time - start_time
tdiffstr <- paste0(round(tdiff,3)," ",attr(tdiff,"units"))
```

**End time:** `r Sys.time()`      
**Elapsed time:** `r tdiffstr`
